subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Adrián converted the decisive spot-kick in a 9-8 penalty shootout after a 2-2 draw against 10-man Everton to send West Ham into the fourth round of the F.A. Cup.
snippet: Adrián converted the decisive spot-kick in a 9-8 penalty shootout after a 2-2 draw against 10-man Everton to send West Ham into the fourth round of the F.A. Cup.
